content: **knitted hat and bib for babies in drops babymerino with stocking stitch and garter stitch size premature to 4 year ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the baby business set bib pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-098-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- * **hat** **sizes** <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years fits head size in cm approx 28/32 34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 48/50 - 50/52 cm **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 50-50-50-50 50-50 g colour 43 light sea green **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b33-20-b-baby-business-set-bib
